alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Humphreys; Madison; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 1:23AM CDT until April 13 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Yazoo County in central Mississippi... Northwestern Hinds County in central Mississippi... Southern Humphreys County in central Mississippi... Southwestern Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 122 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Murphy to 9 miles northwest of Phoenix to near Le Tourneau, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Midnight and Phoenix around 130 AM CDT. Newman and Tinsley around 140 AM CDT. Little Yazoo around 145 AM CDT. Edwards around 150 AM CDT. Raymond and Bolton around 200 AM CDT. Jackson and Clinton around 205 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Eden, Satartia, Silver City, Louise, Learned and Bentonia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for central, southwestern and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
